description: List the global endpoints associated with this account. For more information about global endpoints, see Making applications Regional-fault tolerant with global endpoints and event replication in the Amazon EventBridge User Guide .

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token returned by a previous call, which you can use to retrieve the next set of results. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. To retrieve the next page of results, make the call again using the returned token. Keep all other arguments unchanged. Using an expired pagination token results in an HTTP 400 InvalidToken error.

nested_items.name: Endpoints
nested_items.description: The endpoints returned by the call.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: A description for the endpoint.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: RoutingConfig
nested_items.description: The routing configuration of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: FailoverConfig
nested_items.description: The failover configuration for an endpoint. This includes what triggers failover and what happens when it's triggered.

nested_items.name: HealthCheck
nested_items.description: The ARN of the health check used by the endpoint to determine whether failover is triggered.

nested_items.name: Secondary
nested_items.description: The Region that events are routed to when failover is triggered or event replication is enabled.

nested_items.name: Route
nested_items.description: Defines the secondary Region.

nested_items.name: ReplicationConfig
nested_items.description: Whether event replication was enabled or disabled for this endpoint. The default state is ENABLED which means you must supply a RoleArn. If you don't have a RoleArn or you don't want event replication enabled, set the state to DISABLED.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of event replication.

nested_items.name: EventBuses
nested_items.description: The event buses being used by the endpoint.

nested_items.name: EventBusArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the event bus the endpoint is associated with.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the role used by event replication for the endpoint.

nested_items.name: EndpointId
nested_items.description: The URL subdomain of the endpoint. For example, if the URL for Endpoint is https://abcde.veo.endpoints.event.amazonaws.com, then the EndpointId is abcde.veo.

nested_items.name: EndpointUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The current state of the endpoint.

nested_items.name: StateReason
nested_items.description: The reason the endpoint is in its current state.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: The time the endpoint was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The last time the endpoint was modified.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token indicating there are more results available. If there are no more results, no token is included in the response.
